member.name: M:CMS.ExternalAuthentication.Web.UI.FacebookConnectScriptHelper.GetFacebookInitScriptForSite(System.String)
member.summary: Returns script for Facebook Connect initialization.

member.name: M:CMS.ExternalAuthentication.Web.UI.FacebookConnectScriptHelper.GetFacebookLogoutScriptForSignOut(System.String)
member.summary: Returns Facebook Connect logout script including check whether user is logged to Facebook (if not additional script is executed).
member.param: Additional script called when logging out of facebook finishes

member.name: M:CMS.ExternalAuthentication.Web.UI.FacebookConnectScriptHelper.InitializeFacebookConnect
member.summary: Ensures Facebook connect is initialized. Call on module initialization

member.name: T:CMS.ExternalAuthentication.Web.UI.FacebookSignOutScriptProvider
member.summary: Class whose instance should be registered as a custom logout script provider

member.name: M:CMS.ExternalAuthentication.Web.UI.FacebookSignOutScriptProvider.GetSignOutScript(System.String,System.Web.UI.Page)
member.summary: Builds and returns Facebook logout script which calls the given callback.
member.param: Callback method to be called when this Facebook script finishes
Page to which helper scripts can be registered
member.returns: Facebook logout script which calls the given callback or null if no script is required by this provider
